casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2002-1515. Haley v. Wilson.

Summit App. No. 20967, 2002-Ohio-3987. Reported at 97 Ohio St.3d 1482, 2002-Ohio-6866, 780 N.E.2d 286. On motion for reconsideration and motion for clarification of the entry awarding sanctions for frivolous actions. Motions denied.

Cook, J., dissents in part because she would grant the motion for clarification. Douglas, J., participated in the decision of this cause before his retirement.
